languages.text: "Несколько моих братьев продолжат сражаться в рядах воинства Всеотца, прочие же выжили. Мы пролили немало своей крови, но волчья шкура крепка, а дух упрям — нас мало свалить, надо еще добить. Грозовые укусы выжили и выживут вновь!"

"Several of my brothers will carry on fighting their battles in the Allfather's host. The rest have survived. We've shed much of our blood, but a Wolf's hide is tough and his spirit is stubborn — when you take us down, you had better finish us off. The Stormbiters live on this day, and the next!"
languages.original_text: "Несколько моих братьев продолжат сражаться в рядах воинства Всеотца, прочие же выжили. Мы пролили немало своей крови, но волчья шкура крепка, а дух упрям — нас мало свалить, надо еще добить. Грозовые укусы выжили и выживут вновь!"

traits.locale_text: "Several of my brothers will carry on fighting their battles in the Allfather's host, the rest have survived. We've shed much of our blood, but a Wolf's hide is tough and his spirit is stubborn — once you take us down, you better finish us off. The Stormbiters live, on this day and the next!"

"Several of my brothers will carry on fighting their battles in the Allfather's host. The rest have survived. We've shed much of our blood, but a Wolf's hide is tough and his spirit is stubborn — when you take us down, you had better finish us off. The Stormbiters live on this day, and the next!"

"Several of my brothers will carry on fighting their battles in the Allfather's host. The rest have survived. We've shed much of our blood, but a Wolf's hide is tough and his spirit is stubborn — when you take us down, you had better finish us off. The Stormbiters live on this day, and the next!"

languages.text: “有几位兄弟回到了全父身边，继续战斗，但剩下的人都活了下来。尽管我们流了很多血，但狼皮坚韧无比，狼群的意志也坚不可摧。就算他们打倒了我们，只要没把我们干掉，我们就一定会再次站起来。噬风者生生不息，无论是今日，还是未来！”
languages.original_text: "Several of my brothers will carry on fighting their battles in the Allfather's host. The rest have survived. We've shed much of our blood, but a Wolf's hide is tough and his spirit is stubborn — when you take us down, you had better finish us off. The Stormbiters live on this day, and the next!"

traits.locale_text: “有几位兄弟回到了全父身边，继续战斗，但剩下的人都活了下来。尽管我们流了很多血，但狼皮坚韧无比，狼群的意志也坚不可摧。就算他们打倒了我们，只要没把我们干掉，我们就一定会再次站起来。噬风者生生不息，无论是今日，还是未来！”

languages.text: « Plusieurs de mes frères continueront leurs combats dans l'armée du Père de Tous. Les autres ont survécu. Notre sang a beaucoup coulé, mais la peau d'un Loup est coriace et son esprit, tenace ; si vous nous mettez à terre, il vaut mieux nous achever rapidement. Les Crocs de la tempête sont encore en vie... et ils comptent bien le rester ! »
languages.original_text: "Several of my brothers will carry on fighting their battles in the Allfather's host. The rest have survived. We've shed much of our blood, but a Wolf's hide is tough and his spirit is stubborn — when you take us down, you had better finish us off. The Stormbiters live on this day, and the next!"

traits.locale_text: « Plusieurs de mes frères continueront leurs combats dans l'armée du Père de Tous. Notre sang a beaucoup coulé, mais la peau d'un Loup est coriace et son esprit, tenace ; si vous nous mettez à terre, il vaut mieux nous achever rapidement. Les Crocs de la tempête sont encore en vie, et ils comptent bien le rester ! »

languages.text: 「同胞の何人かは全知の父の軍勢の中で戦い続けるだろう。俺たちは多くの血を流したが、狼の皮は堅く、精神は頑強だ…俺たちは最後まで始末されない限り、何度でも立ち上がる。嵐喰いの者たちは今日も、明日も、その先も生き続けよう！」
languages.original_text: "Several of my brothers will carry on fighting their battles in the Allfather's host. The rest have survived. We've shed much of our blood, but a Wolf's hide is tough and his spirit is stubborn — when you take us down, you had better finish us off. The Stormbiters live on this day, and the next!"

traits.locale_text: 「同胞の何人かは全知の父の軍勢の中で戦い続けるだろう。俺たちは多くの血を流したが、狼の皮は堅く、精神は頑強だーー俺たちは最後まで始末されない限り、何度でも立ち上がる。嵐喰いの者たちは今日も、明日も、その先も生き続けよう！」

languages.text: «Varios de mis hermanos seguirán librando sus batallas en la hueste del Padre de todas las cosas. Los demás, en cambio, han sobrevivido. Hemos derramado mucha sangre de los nuestros, pero los Lobos tenemos la piel gruesa y el espíritu inquebrantable. Si nos derriban, lo mejor es que nos rematen. ¡Que vivan los Muerdetormentas! ¡En esta vida y en la siguiente!».
languages.original_text: "Several of my brothers will carry on fighting their battles in the Allfather's host. The rest have survived. We've shed much of our blood, but a Wolf's hide is tough and his spirit is stubborn — when you take us down, you had better finish us off. The Stormbiters live on this day, and the next!"

traits.locale_text: «Varios de mis hermanos seguirán librando sus batallas en la hueste del Padre de todas las cosas. Los demás, en cambio, han sobrevivido. Hemos derramado mucha sangre de los nuestros, pero los Lobos tenemos la piel gruesa y el espíritu inquebrantable. Si nos derriban, lo mejor es que nos rematen. ¡Que vivan los Muerdetormentas! ¡En esta vida y en la siguiente!».

languages.text: "Mehrere meiner Brüder werden ihren Kampf in den Horden des Allvaters fortsetzen, die anderen haben überlebt. Wir haben viel von unserem Blut vergossen, doch die Haut eines Wolfs ist zäh, und sein Geist ist stur. Wenn man uns zu Boden zwingt, sollte man uns auch töten. Die Stormbiters leben, an diesem Tag und auch am morgigen!"
languages.original_text: "Several of my brothers will carry on fighting their battles in the Allfather's host. The rest have survived. We've shed much of our blood, but a Wolf's hide is tough and his spirit is stubborn — when you take us down, you had better finish us off. The Stormbiters live on this day, and the next!"
